医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现考虑性别可提高心力衰竭 CMR 生物标志物的精确度和预后性能研究人员调查了性别对心力衰竭（HF）诊断中左心室充盈压（LVFP）的心脏磁共振（CMR）评估的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af494145-2fab-4916-99dc-12d9f311fdba Fri, 17 May 2024 12:21:00 -0400 Study finds accounting for sex improves precision and prognostic performance of CMR biomarkers for heart failure
血液中的蛋白质可以在人们诊断癌症之前七年多向人们发出癌症警告英国研究人员利用观察和遗传学方法对英国生物银行的参与者调查了 1,463 种血浆蛋白与 19 种癌症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Proteins-in-the-blood-could-warn-people-of-cancer-more-than-seven-years-before-it-is-diagnosed。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Proteins-in-the-blood-could-warn-people-of-cancer-more-than-seven-years-before-it-is-diagnosed。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2283578-c5e3-428e-8a3b-97812c7c805b Fri, 17 May 2024 11:36:00 -0400 Proteins in the blood could warn people of cancer more than seven years before it is diagnosed
充分利用酶标仪：使用建议在本次采访中，NewsMed 与 Ann-Cathrin Volz 和 Martin Mangold 讨论了酶标仪和使用建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Get-the-best-out-of-your-microplate-reader-recommendations-for-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Get-the-best-out-of-your-microplate-reader-recommendations-for-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6c70496-2b40-41d2-b85e-26923acbd959 Fri, 17 May 2024 09:07:00 -0400 Get the best out of your microplate reader: recommendations for use
FDA 批准 Nova 的 Stat Profile Prime Plus 分析仪用于微毛细管样品模式Nova Biomedical 很高兴地宣布，美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 已批准 Stat Profile Prime Plus® 重症监护分析仪上的微毛细管样本模式使用 510(k) 许可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/FDA-clears-Novae28099s-Stat-Profile-Prime-Plus-analyzer-for-micro-capillary-sample-mode.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/FDA-clears-Novae28099s-Stat-Profile-Prime-Plus-analyzer-for-micro-capillary-sample-mode.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c4da5da-d711-4fad-bf29-04fb4efb322a Fri, 17 May 2024 08:48:00 -0400 FDA clears Nova’s Stat Profile Prime Plus analyzer for micro capillary sample mode
阳光和公益事业：Bedfont® Scientific 的团队在肯特临终关怀中心 2024 年风信子步行活动中筹集重要资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Sunshine-and-Steps-for-a-Cause-Bedfontc2ae-Scientifice28099s-Team-Raise-Vital-Funds-at-Heart-of-Kent-Hospicee28099s-风信子-Walk-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Sunshine-and-Steps-for-a-Cause-Bedfontc2ae-Scientifice28099s-Team-Raise-Vital-Funds-at-Heart-of-Kent-Hospicee28099s-风信子-Walk-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ac922f5-e2d9-445e-b9d3-2c5b1efce16e Fri, 17 May 2024 08:45:00 -0400 Sunshine and Steps for a Cause: Bedfont® Scientific’s Team Raise Vital Funds at Heart of Kent Hospice’s Bluebell Walk 2024.
人工智能揭示全球抗菌素耐药性研究的差距人工智能 (AI) 帮助确定全球抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 研究中的知识、方法和沟通差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/AI-uncovers-gaps-in-global-antimicrobial-resistance-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/AI-uncovers-gaps-in-global-antimicrobial-resistance-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb1b2e40-2f35-41fd-8339-d365741b0ad5 Fri, 17 May 2024 08:02:00 -0400 AI uncovers gaps in global antimicrobial resistance research
Varenicline 在美国首次戒烟试验中显示出希望研究人员表示，美国首次使用伐尼克兰戒烟电子烟的试验显示出有希望的结果，值得进行更大规模的试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Varenicline-shows-promise-in-first-US-Trial-for-e-香烟-cessation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Varenicline-shows-promise-in-first-US-Trial-for-e-香烟-cessation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5441ca7f-c0fa-4db4-b61e-0d6d8e987754 Fri, 17 May 2024 07:54:00 -0400 Varenicline shows promise in first U.S. trial for e-cigarette cessation
研究确定了引发乳糜泻患者肠漏的关键麸质肽今天是国际乳糜泻日。乳糜泻是一种慢性自身免疫性疾病，全世界约百分之一的人口患有乳糜泻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-identizes-key-gluten-peptide-triggering-leaky-gut-in-celiac-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-identizes-key-gluten-peptide-triggering-leaky-gut-in-celiac-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58f98fec-4ff1-4ef3-99cb-2547635b7032 Fri, 17 May 2024 07:46:00 -0400 Study identifies key gluten peptide triggering leaky gut in celiac patients
复兴被拒绝的药物：新型选择性抗生素显示出希望二十年前，一种候选药物因其副作用而被拒绝。研究人员现在已经找到了如何使后继分子更具选择性的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Reviving-a-rejected-drug-New-selective-antibiotic-shows-promise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Reviving-a-rejected-drug-New-selective-antibiotic-shows-promise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ecc5b43c-1bef-4f34-a65a-d9ddd7645c60 Fri, 17 May 2024 07:39:00 -0400 Reviving a rejected drug: New selective antibiotic shows promise
突破性成像技术揭示近视眼的详细巩膜模式眼病在世界范围内极为普遍，最近的估计表明，全球三分之一的人口患有某种类型的视力障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Breakthrough-imaging-technique-uncovers-detailed-scleral-patterns-in-myopic-eyes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Breakthrough-imaging-technique-uncovers-detailed-scleral-patterns-in-myopic-eyes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=968c8f36-ed9c-4d1a-955f-6df1081c73b2 Fri, 17 May 2024 07:30:00 -0400 Breakthrough imaging technique uncovers detailed scleral patterns in myopic eyes
